pageTextData.subTitle: Current Block Height
pageTextData.description: This is the last block in the bitcoin blockchain:

pageTextData.subTitle: Bits Transacted in this Block
pageTextData.description: This is the number of bits transacted in the last bitcoin block

pageTextData.subTitle: Miner Address in this Block
pageTextData.description: This is the address of the miner that validated this bitcoin transaction

pageTextData.subTitle: Amount Received at this Miner Address
pageTextData.description: This is the amount of Satoshi's held by the miner at this address

pageTextData.subTitle: Total Bitcoins at this Miner Address
pageTextData.description: This is the total value of bitcoins held by this miner at this address

pageTextData.subTitle: Bitcoin unconfirmed transaction values in real-time
pageTextData.description: This is a real-time stream of latest bitcoin transaction values accessed using the bitcoin.info Websocket

pageTextData.section_1: Blockchain — Bitcoin Last Price Information (Exchange APIs)
pageTextData.section_2: Blockchain — Bitcoin Current Block Information (Blockchain.info APIs)
pageTextData.section_3: Blockchain — Bitcoin Current Block Information (Blockchain.info Websocket)
